item.description: Thomas Lin Pedersen (known aliases: @thomasp85, data imaginist) has quite an array of cool packages, all of which you should check out. However, in celebration its CRANniversary ğŸˆ I thought ggraph deserved a roundup post of its own.1 Dispatches from a proud papa ğŸ‘¨ ggraph: A grammar of graphics for relational data The repo from whence it sprangâ€¦ More cool R viz-ness from @thomasp85 "ggraph" https://t.co/ncCKDHlQAx #rstats #dataviz #ggplot2 pic.
